Big Gunz, light vehicles and Dreadnoughts count as two units each. Critical Hit Effect: The unit catches fires. Roll a D6 for each fire burning on the unit in the end phase of each turn. On a roll of 1 a second fire starts, and on a roll of 5â€“6 the fire is put out. Any fires not put out cause one point of damage.
